description: Try this easy Mexican-inspired wrap recipe for your next barbecue. Four ingredients and 15 minutes is all you need to rustle up this tasty meal.
keywords: Beef wrap,Quick & easy dinner,Weeknight dinner,Dinner Made Easy,Beef
name: Mexican-Inspired Beef & Chimichurri Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g Woolworths BBQ beef flank steak with chimichurri

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a greased barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Cook beef, reserving sauce, for 5 minutes on each side for medium or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate, cover loosely with foil and rest for 5 minutes. Thinly slice.
Meanwhile, prepare salad kits according to packet instructions.
Top wraps with cheese, a little of the salad, steak and a little of the reserved sauce.
Fold wraps to enclose filling. Serve with remaining salad and sauce.
